contents.name: Menti-Silver Plus
contents.introduction: Dementia prevention DB management system using ARS technology and voice recognition technology customized for seniors

sections.subTitle: # Objectives
contents: Provide self-examination of dementia regardless of time and place where visiting examinations have become difficult due to COVID-19
Find a risk factor, provide sustained practical action preventing dementia and cognitive training program with dementia risk reduction targets.

sections.subTitle: # Contribution
contents: Developed mobile webpage for ARS KDSQ Test
Developed webpage for dementia center patient management
Data visualization with chart and table

contents.name: Denti-i 2022
contents.introduction: A platform for dental care that can be efficiently managed by schools, health centers, and hospitals

sections.subTitle: # Objectives
contents: A service that provides technical support to children who do not attend school so that they can receive free oral treatment at a dental medical institution designated by the local government.

sections.subTitle: # Contribution
contents: Data visualization with chart and table
Showing a location of cavities with tooth image(svg)
Upgrade webpage CSS styles to SASS styles

contents.name: Denti-ROKA
contents.introduction: Dental care platform for korean soldiers

sections.subTitle: # Objectives
contents: Using a smartphone camera, check plaque through self-mouth imaging and provide oral education contents to manage the oral cavity of soldiers

sections.subTitle: # Contribution
contents: Developed admin webpages for user creation, management, and statistics
Created statistic with tooth images, chart, table
Applied english and vietnamese translation with vue-i18n
